text: Opposing Viewpoints is a series of books on current events. It tries to explore the many different opinions of each event in the style of a debate. The series tries to encourage critical thinking and public awareness by providing opposing views on issues that have been debated. ==Books in the series== *Abortion: Opposing Viewpoints (2002) edited by Mary E.
